div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 9 Eretria, Euboea, c. 1870 (399) Burial: 500-480 B.C. (T) Contents: AR Eretria: tetradr., didr. (cow/octopus) Athens: Wappenm. (incl. gorgon tetradr.) tetradr. (early owls) Disposition: Berlin 1? (Athenian owl; cf. Köhler) Köhler, AM 1884, pp. 355-7
